plot outline: In a small village three young men who leading their life purposeless by doing small robberies without respecting their parents & society. A civil contractor who believes in superstitions takes help of Kollegala a witchcraft to solve his problems. Now the young men lives are in danger. Will they Escape ? The Story reveals.
title: Kollegala
plot: In a small village three young men who leading their life purposeless by doing small robberies without respecting their parents & society. A civil contractor who believes in superstitions takes help of _Kollegala_ (qv) a witchcraft to solve his problems. Now the young men lives are in danger. Will they Escape ? The Story reveals.
